description.en:
Mage Doge is the newest BSC DeFi hyper deflationary community driven token, powered with automatic buybacks, burns and static rewards (fork of notorious EverRise). The Mage Doge contract automatically casts powerful spells at every transaction, accelerating deflation and rising the price floor by buying $MGDG tokens and burning them, and rewarding holders with frictionless yield. 

The $MGDG is not just another meme token, it’s a fresh project inspired by faithful dogs love, powered with auto buybacks & burns, frictionless yield, NFT, merchandise and aimed to create an NFT Game.

One of priority tasks to expand the project in the future is to go beyond Magic Yield, and develop digital and real world $MGDG games. All NFTs and art work of community designers since first days serve as a basis of Mage Doge universe creation, breaking the barriers and opening the doors to wider audience.
